PP.title: Data Collection in Mobile Applications
PP.description: We detail what personal information we collect through our mobile applications, including usage data, location (if necessary for functionality) and any information voluntarily provided by the user.

PP.title: Cookie Management and Browsing Data
PP.description: We explain how we use cookies and similar technologies on our web platforms to improve user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content.

PP.title: Security in Automated Processes
PP.description: We describe the protection measures implemented to safeguard data used in our business automation solutions, including encryption and access controls.

PP.title: Privacy in Chatbot Interactions
PP.description: We specify how conversations and data shared through our chatbot systems are handled, stored, and protected, and how they are used to improve the service.

PP.title: Sharing Data with Third Parties
PP.description: We detail when and how we might share information with technology partners, service providers, or legally authorized entities, always prioritizing user data protection.

PP.title: User Rights
PP.description: We inform about the rights users have regarding their personal data, including access, rectification, deletion, portability, and opposition to processing.

PP.title: Data Retention and Deletion
PP.description: We establish our policies on how long we keep user data in our systems and the processes for its secure deletion when no longer needed.

PP.title: Policy Updates
PP.description: We explain how and when we might update our privacy policy, and how we will notify users about significant changes in our data handling practices.

TC.title: Scope of Services
TC.description: We clearly define the services we offer, including mobile development, web solutions, process automation, and chatbot systems, as well as the technical and operational limitations of each.

TC.title: Intellectual Property
TC.description: We establish the intellectual property rights related to our products, source code, designs, and content, specifying what belongs to our company and what licenses are granted to the client.

TC.title: User Responsibilities
TC.description: We detail the obligations of users when using our services, including the appropriate use of applications, web platforms, and automated systems that we develop.

TC.title: Limitations of Liability
TC.description: We clarify the limits of our liability regarding service interruptions, technical errors, data loss, and other incidents that could affect the operation of our solutions.

TC.title: Payment and Billing Terms
TC.description: We define the payment conditions, deadlines, accepted methods, refund policies, and any recurring charges related to our development and maintenance services.

TC.title: Confidentiality
TC.description: We establish mutual confidentiality obligations regarding sensitive information exchanged during project development and solution implementation.

TC.title: Cancellation and Termination
TC.description: We detail the conditions under which both parties can terminate the contractual relationship, including procedures, notifications, and consequences on active services.

TC.title: Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
TC.description: We specify the legal jurisdiction that governs our agreements and the mechanisms to resolve possible disputes, whether through mediation, arbitration, or judicial procedures.
